message: TikTok is a short-form video social platform owned by ByteDance. Users upload clips (roughly 15 seconds to 10 minutes) often using music/effects. Discovery is driven by the personalized "For You" feed powered by aggressive interest-based recommendations; community trends and hashtags evolve quickly.
